mapper.sql: id, share_Id, share_User_Id, share_User, share_Pwd, share_Time, share_Status, file_id, access_times, download_times, save_times
mapper.insert: insert into sharefile (id, share_Id, share_User_Id, share_User, share_Pwd, share_Time, share_Status, file_id, access_times, download_times, save_times) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sharePwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shareStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accessTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloadTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saveTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
share_Id,
share_User_Id,
share_User,

access_times,

mapper.update:
update sharefile
share_Id = #{shareId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_User_Id = #{shareUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
share_User = #{shareUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_Pwd = #{sharePwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_Time = #{shareTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
share_Status = #{shareStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
access_times = #{accessTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
download_times = #{downloadTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
save_times = #{saveTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sharefile set share_Id = #{shareId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_User_Id = #{shareUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_User = #{shareUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_Pwd = #{sharePwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_Time = #{shareTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, share_Status = #{shareStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, access_times = #{accessTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, download_times = #{downloadTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, save_times = #{saveTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select s.share_Id, s.share_Time, u.username, u.avatar, f.id file_id, f.file_save_name, f.file_real_name, f.file_size, f.file_type, f.is_Dir from shareFile s,fileupload f,usernetdisk u where s.share_Id = #{shareId} and s.file_id = f.id and share_Status = ${@group.xuxiake.common.util.NetdiskConstant@SHARE_STATUS_OF_NORMAL} and f.file_status = ${@group.xuxiake.common.util.NetdiskConstant@FILE_STATUS_OF_NORMAL} and s.share_User_id = u.id
